title: LLM Engineering · Prompt Chains Basics
summary: Notes on structuring multi-step prompts, guarding failure modes, and adding evals.
content:
This note outlines simple patterns for chaining prompts: classification → extraction → synthesis. Add lightweight checks at boundaries (e.g., JSON schema validation) and track a few quality metrics per step.

  • Specify structured outputs (JSON with schema)
  • Constrain temperature for extractive steps
  • Add small evals: completeness, format, contradiction

Over time, log decisions and surface failure exemplars to guide refinement.

title: Statistics · Regression Diagnostics Checklist
summary: Quick checklist for linear model assumptions and what to do when they break.
content: Start with residual plots (trend, heteroscedasticity), influence (Cook's distance), multicollinearity (VIF), and distributional checks. If assumptions fail, consider transforms, robust SE, or alternative models (GLM, quantile regression).
